glsa.title: file: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in file could result in Denial of Service.

background.p: file is a utility that guesses a file format by scanning binary data for patterns.

description.p: Multiple out-of-bounds read errors and invalid pointer dereference errors have been found in cdf.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted Composite Document File (CDF) using file, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All file users should upgrade to the latest version:
